news.title: Together For Palestine announce livestream details and final lineup including Ruth Negga, Paul Weller, Florence Pugh and more
news.summary: The lineup also features the likes of Benedict Cumberbatch, Jameela Jamil, PinkPantheress, Damon Albarn, Portishead and more.

news.title: Ben & Jerry’s co-founder Jerry Greenfield steps down after being 'silenced' by Unilever over stance on Gaza
news.summary: "If the company couldn't stand up for the things we believed, then it wasn't worth being a a company at all," said Jerry Greenfield.

news.title: Keaton Henson announces new album Parader, shares new single ‘Insomnia’
news.summary: The record comes out on November 21 via Play it Again Sam.

news.title: Foo Fighters introduce new drummer with joke AI video
news.summary: Watch the full video down below.

news.title: Sky Arts Awards honour Bob Geldof and Sally Rooney
news.summary: The Sky Arts Awards have taken place since 1997, and exist to celebrate the creative triumphs of British and Irish artists.

news.title: Comedian Rachel Galvo announces Christmas performance of her show The Shite Feminist
news.summary: After selling out 16 shows across Ireland in the past 12 months with a tour that included dates in Dublin, Cork, Galway, Belfast, and Limerick – Rachel is gearing up to play at the Ambassador Theatre, Dublin.

news.title: Student Special: The Essential Shows To Watch This New Academic Year
news.summary: Roe McDermott on the top student viewing to binge this autumn

news.title: HousePlants announce Irish shows and new live album Live at The Beekeeper’s
news.summary: They will play Cork, Galway and Limerick on December 11, 12 and 13.

news.title: On this day in 1982: The Philip Lynott Album was released
news.summary: On September 17, 1982, Philip Lynott released his classic solo record. The album featured hits like 'Old Town', as well as appearances from Midge Ure, Mark Knopfler and more. We're revisiting Liam Mackey's original review.
